item.title: LogiMech
item.description: Prologue Logitech Extreme 3D Pro is a legendary joystick/flightstick, however you want to say it. It was released in 2003 and it is still in production and sold for around 50‚Ç¨. You can get these for cheap. The joystick itself is really basic, but gives you a good variety of buttons and features for a small price. Even if the name gives you a small hint, that there might be a casual version of the joystick, but on the contrary, there isn’t.

item.title: Keyboard portfolio

item.title: About me
item.description: It’s a me, Heikki! My name is Heikki and I live in Finland. I am currently working as a information security specialist at F-Secure, but during my free time I am part of a hacking team called LeftOvers. You can see me in multiple InfoSec related communities. If you happen to see me, please come say hi! In October 2020, I decided to start doing mechanical keyboard stuff (assemblying and fixing etc.
